DOC.brief_summary: Subjects with elevated serum triglycerides in the 4th Tromso study in 1994/1995 were re-examined with an oral glucose tolerance test to see predictive value of triglycerides regarding development of type 2 diabetes
DOC.brief_title: Elevated Triglyceride Levels and Later Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: participants in the 4 Tromso study 1994 and with elevated serum triglyceride levels type 2 diabetes
